articles.title: Kim Jong Il Has Photo Session with Commanding Officers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Has Photo Session with Commanding Officers
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, met and had a photo session with the commanding officers who took part in the military parade held to celebrate the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 All the participants enthusiastically welcomed with highest glory and warmest thanks Kim Jong Il who has strengthened and developed the WPK into President Kim Il Sung's great party both in name and reality and a powerful guiding force for the Songun revolution tightly holding arms.
					
					  He waved back to the enthusiastically cheering participants, extending a warm salute to them.
					
					 He warmly congratulated the commanding officers of the units which staged the military parade and had a photo session with them.
					
					 He expressed expectation and conviction that all the commanding officers who took part in the parade would play a vanguard role in carrying out the Party's military line and thus increase the combat capability of the units and make a positive contribution to turning the socialist homeland into an impregnable fortress.
					
					  Present there were Ri Yong Ho, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and chief of the General Staff of the KPA, Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the WPK Central Military Commission, Kim Yong Chun, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C, the WPK and minister of the People's Armed Forces, Ju Sang Song, member of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and minister of the People's Security, Kim Jong Gak, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and first vice director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, staff members of the Supreme Command of the KPA, the commanders of all services and arms of the KPA and other commanding officers of the army, Pak To Chun, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the WPK Central Committee, Ju Kyu Chang, alternate member of the Political Bureau and department director of the WPK Central Committee, and O Il Jong, department director of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: DPRK Youth League Delegation Leaves for China
articles.content:
DPRK Youth League Delegation Leaves for China
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League headed by First Secretary of its Central Committee Ri Yong Chol left here Tuesday to visit China.

articles.title: Reception Given by Russian Ambassador
articles.content:
Reception Given by Russian Ambassador
Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Valery Sukhinin hosted a reception at his embassy Tuesday to mark the 62nd anniversary of the establishment of the DPRK-Russia diplomatic relations.
					 Present there on invitation were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Hong Son Ok, vice-chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and chairwoman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association, and officials concerned.
					
					 Staff members of the Russian embassy were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Il Sung from Austrian Organization
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Il Sung from Austrian Organization
Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung was presented with a gift by the Left Bloc of the Austrian Trade Union Federation on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The gift was conveyed to an official concerned on Tuesday by Federal Secretary of the Bloc Oliver Jonischkeit on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Austrian Organization
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Austrian Organization
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the Left Bloc of the Austrian Trade Union Federation on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The gift was conveyed to an official concerned on Tuesday by Federal Secretary of the Bloc Oliver Jonischkeit on a visit to the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Jong Il also received a congratulatory letter from the federal secretary that day on the same occasion.

articles.title: Memorial Tower Telling Feats of WPK
articles.content:
Memorial Tower Telling Feats of WPK
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- A large number of people, including servicepersons and schoolchildren, have visited the Party Founding Memorial Tower in Pyongyang to mark the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (October 10).
					 The visitors pay homage to President Kim Il Sung, who founded a new-typed revolutionary party reflecting the demand of the Juche era and the desire of the popular masses and led it successfully. 
					
					They also learn about the immortal feats General Secretary Kim Jong Il performed in developing the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung and vow to remain faithful to his leadership in the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 Kim Chol Bong, a 24-year-old officer of the Korean People's Army, told KCNA that the tower showed the historic roots and glorious revolutionary traditions of the WPK had been provided in the flames of the arduous anti-Japanese revolution. He also said he would fulfill his duty in defending the cause of the great party with arms. 
					
					 In an interview with KCNA, Ri Kum Hyok, a 32-year-old worker of the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex, voiced his belief that victory and glory would always be in store for the WPK, led by Kim Jong Il, and confirmed his determination to work hard for the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 Since the tower was erected in October Juche 84 (1995), it has been visited by more than 4 688 000 people.
					
					 Among them are some 200,000 foreigners.
					
					 Looking around the tower, they spoke highly of the WPK for its immortal feats for socialism and the independence of humankind.

articles.title: International Trade Fair to Be Held in Pyongyang
articles.content:
International Trade Fair to Be Held in Pyongyang
Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The 6th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair will be held at the Three-revolution Exhibition from October 18 to 21.
					 The fair will draw some 140 companies of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and other countries,  exhibiting more than 57,000 pieces of 2,300 kinds with electrical machinery, steel goods, electronics products, foodstuffs, daily necessities, medicines, building materials, chemical goods and rolling stocks included.
					
					 Commercial consultation and activities for exchange and economic cooperation will also be held during the fair.
					
					 According to Ryu Jong On, a section chief of the Korean International Exhibition Corporation, businesses of China, Russia, Malaysia, Mongolia, Syria, Germany, Brazil and other ten countries have already entered their names for the fair.

articles.title: Online Lecture Begins
articles.content:
Online Lecture Begins
Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The Grand People's Study House in Pyongyang has begun an online-lecture service.
					 Now scientists, technicians and other working people across the country have access to lectures given at the Grand People's Study House.
					
					 Through computer networks, the study house gives a real-time audio-visual lecture, answers to questions and exchange of data simultaneously.
					
					 Video lecture is also available for those who missed the real-time lecture.

articles.title: Natural Graphite Electrodes Produced
articles.content:
Natural Graphite Electrodes Produced
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea has succeeded in producing electrodes with newly developed natural graphite materials, a signal progress in the development of graphite industry.
					 Visiting a factory in June,General Secretary Kim Jong Il carefully watched the production process of natural graphite electrodes for UHP electric arc furnaces and highly praised the scientists and workers who made a great achievement in the electrode production. 
					
					 The production of graphite electrodes based on domestic raw materials and technology gives a great encouragement to the Korean people in their effort for the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 Now the graphite industry of the DPRK with large graphite deposits has entered a new phase of its development.
					
					 Besides, various kinds of graphite goods, including efficient natural graphite electric brush, have been developed in the country and the production has been boosted in the graphite sector.

articles.title: Cancellation of Projected Anti-DPRK War Exercises Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Cancellation of Projected Anti-DPRK War Exercises Called for in S. Korea
Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Democratic Labor Party of south Korea held a press conference on Oct. 7 to demand the puppet authorities roll back their scenario for war exercises to invade the north.
					 Accusing the authorities of scheming to stage PSI-related maritime interception and search exercises targeted against the north in waters off Pusan in collusion with the U.S., the spokesman said that this is a sinister intention to trigger off military conflict on the Korean Peninsula at any cost.
					
					 Unpardonable is their design to get Maritime "Self-Defense Force" of Japan involved in the exercises though it has become undisguised in its moves to grab Tok Islets, far from making apology and reparation for the past crimes, he noted, stressing:
					
					 The above-said scenario for exercises and the projected involvement of SDF of war criminal state Japan should be stopped at an early date as they escalate tensions on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Songun Politics Lauded
articles.content:
Songun Politics Lauded
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Kalevi Warman, chairman of the Finnish Communists' League, issued a statement on Oct. 6 to mark the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The statement noted that President Kim Il Sung founded the WPK and thereby the Korean people could have a new-type revolutionary party and achieve great successes in the efforts to create an independent new life under the leadership of the Party.
					
					Under the wise guidance of the President and General Secretary Kim Jong Il the Korean people have waged dynamic struggle to build powerful and prosperous socialism, deeply conscious of being masters of the revolution, it said.
					
					 The statement stressed that Kim Jong Il's Songun politics is based on the Juche idea of the President and serves as the most just political mode which makes it possible to foil the imperialists' aggression and military intervention and realize the popular masses' independence.
					
					 Extending invariable support and solidarity to the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the WPK, the Finnish Communists' League expresses firm belief that the Korean people will win only victory in the efforts to build a thriving nation under the leadership of the WPK, it concluded.

articles.title: Birthday of WPK Observed
articles.content:
Birthday of WPK Observed 
Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- A meeting and a Kimjongilia exhibition took place in Russia and meetings, book and photo exhibitions and film shows in Thailand and Guinea between Sept. 30 and Oct. 6 to celebrate General Secretary Kim Jong Il's reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 65th birthday of the WPK.
					 Displayed in their venues were books and photos on the exploits President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by leading the party building and on the WPK's history of victory and glory.
					
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 The chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand said that Kim Jong Il's reelection as general secretary of the WPK represented the absolute support and trust of all the Korean people in him and the steadfast will of the army and people of the DPRK to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche under his leadership.
					
					 The director general of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea noted that the WPK has further strengthened into a powerful party in which the leader, the party and the masses become a harmonious whole as it has already had at its top post Kim Jong Il creditably carrying forward Kim Il Sung's cause of party building.
					
					 We are firmly convinced that the Korean people will surely open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012 marking the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung, founder of socialist Korea, with the pride and honor of having reelected Kim Jong Il as general secretary of the WPK, he added.
					
					 Messages of greetings to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the events in Russia and Guinea.
					
					 Meanwhile, a seminar and a book and photo exhibition were held in Nepal, round-table talks in Egypt, a lecture and a book exhibition and a film show in India and a juvenile Taekwon-do demonstration match in Russia between Sept. 30 and Oct. 4 to commemorate the anniversary of the WPK.
					
					 The participants in the film shows watched Korean films "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" and "Pyongyang at Night".
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the event in Nepal.

articles.title: Proposal for Founding DFRK Supported
articles.content:
Proposal for Founding DFRK Supported
Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a statement on Oct. 5 in support of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.
					 Saying that President Kim Il Sung set forth the proposal at the 6th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on Oct. 10, 1980, the statement stressed that the proposal calling for reunifying the country, while leaving the ideologies and systems in the north and the south as they are, is the just and aboveboard one acceptable to the north and the south alike as it is in line with the requirements and interests of the Koreans and the internationally recognized principle of peace and national self-determination.
					
					 The proposal constitutes the three charters for national reunification together with the three principles of national renunciation and the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation, it said, adding that the three charters are being fully supported by the world progressives loving peace and justice.
					
					 Reaffirming full support for the proposal for founding the DFRK, the statement stressed that the committee would struggle together with the Korean people till the proposal is realized.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in South Africa
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in South Africa
Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was brought out in booklet by the Minuteman Publishing House of South Africa on October 5.
					 The work, published on October 2, Juche 84 (1995), is an immortal programme for party building and activities as it reviews with high pride the glorious history of the WPK which carved out a new path for building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and indicates the way for developing the WPK into the eternal party of the President.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe a delegacion del Partido Comunista de China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe a delegacion del Partido Comunista de China
　Pyongyang, 12 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, se reunio el dia 11 con la delegacion del Partido Comunista de China encabezada por Zhou Yongkang, miembro del Comite Permanente del Buro Politico del Comite Central y secretario de la Comision Central de Politicas y Ley del PCCh, de visita en Corea.
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los miembros suplentes del Buro Politico y secretarios del CC del PTC, Kim Yong Il y Kim Yang Gon.
					
					  En representacion del colectivo directivo central del PCCh incluyendo al Secretario General Hu Jintao, Zhou Yongkang volvio a felicitar calidamente la celebracion exitosa de la Conferencia del PTC, la reeleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Secretario General del PTC y el 65o aniversario de la fundacion de esta agrupacion politica y traslado al Dirigente el regalo preparado por su delegacion.
					
					  Tras agradecerlo y encomendar el saludo al Secretario General Hu Jintao y otros miembros del colectivo directivo central del PCCh, el Dirigente departio con Zhou Yongkang en un ambiente cordial y amistoso.
					
					  Terminada la audiencia, el Dirigente ofrecio un almuerzo en honor de los huespedes.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe regalo de Sun Zhengcai
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe regalo de Sun Zhengcai
Pyongyang, 12 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio presente que le dedicara el secretario del Comite Provincial del Partido Comunista de China en Jilin, Sun Zhengcai, de visita en Corea.
					  El visitante lo entrego el dia 11 a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: VI Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias Otonal
articles.content:
VI Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias Otonal
Pyongyang, 12 de octubre (ATCC) -- Tendra lugar del dia 18 al 21 en la capitalina Exposicion Permanente de las Tres Revoluciones la VI Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias Otonal de Pyongyang.
					  En esta feria se exhibiran mas de 57 mil mercancias de mas de 2 mil 300 variedades presentadas por mas de 140 companias de Corea y otros paises, entre ellas, los equipos electricos y mecanicos, los productos de acero, los efectos electronicos, los alimentos, los articulos de uso diario y las medicinas, los materiales de construccion y los productos quimicos, los vehiculos, etc. 
					
					　Se realizaran tambien la consulta comercial y las gestiones para el intercambio y la cooperacion economica.
					
					　El jefe de seccion de la Agencia de Exposicion Internacional de Corea, Ryu Jong On, (de 50 anos) dijo que ha recibido ya la solicitud de participacion de las firmas y empresas de 17 paises, incluyendo a China, Rusia, Malasia, Mongolia, Siria, Alemania y Brasil.

articles.title: Se ofrece funcion conjunta por el 65o aniversario del PTC
articles.content:
Se ofrece funcion conjunta por el 65o aniversario del PTC
Pyongyang, 12 de octubre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 11 en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang Este la funcion de canciones y bailes del Conjunto Nacional de Arte.
					　La presenciaron los cuadros directivos del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las entidades de masas, los ministerios y los organos centrales, los trabajadores capitalinos, los miembros de los grupos de felicitacion, delegaciones y grupos de visita de los coreanos residentes en Japon y otras regiones, el representante de la Sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang, los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises y los delegados de las organizaciones internacionales, acreditados en Corea, y los huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					　Se presentaron en la ocasion diversas piezas como el solo femenino "El General Kim Il Sung es nuestro Sol" y "Cantamos del partido", el cuarteto femenino "Que prospere la epoca del Partido del Trabajo", el trio femenino "Ongheya del triunfo del Songun", el baile "Yangsando", el solo femenino "Si pensamos en el camino del Songun", el coro "Gloria a nuestro gran Partido", etc.
					
					　Los ejecutantes alabaron apasionadamente las imborrables proezas del Presidente Kim Il Sung, quien preparo el fundamento eterno de prosperidad de la Corea del Songun al iniciar y conducir la causa de construccion del partido revolucionario bajo la bandera de la idea Juche, la del Songun, y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien desarrollo el PTC como eterno partido del Lider y poderosa fuerza orientadora de la revolucion del Songun.
					
					　Ellos interpretaron tambien la cancion acompanada de Kayagum (instrumento musical coreano) "Tres mil ries de vinalon", el duo mixto y coro "Es mejor el acero Juche", el baile acompanado de cancion "Que conquisten la cumbre de la tecnologia de punta", el coro "Arirang de prosperidad" y otras piezas que muestran emocionantemente la realidad de la patria donde gracias a la sabia direccion del partido, se abrio la era prospera del Partido del Trabajo realizandose todos los ideales del pueblo.
